name: jpkcom-wptheme-plugin
description: JPKCom WordPress Theme Plugin SASS compiler

scripts.compile: node-sass src/sass/style.scss assets/css/style.css --source-map=true --output-style=expanded && node-sass src/sass/gutenberg.scss assets/css/gutenberg.css --source-map=true --output-style=expanded
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run prefix

author: Jean Pierre Kolb <jpk@jpkc.com> (https://www.jpkc.com/)
